physical_appearance: This is an embroidered choli. It features a dense embroided design along the lower half of the garment, with geometric patterns. The sleeves feature a gold brocade panel.
sgcool_label_text: A blouse from the Dhebaria Rebari community of Kutch, Gujarat
subject_terms_1: folk costume embroidery (visual works) geometric motifs blouses (main garments) tops (garments, general)
subject_terms_2: Ethnic costume Blouses Embroidery Brocade Motifs Rabaris
